name: Skyfall
body:
## Skyfall

Skyfall was the last iteration we worked on, while running [MathHarbor](http://hq.mathharbor.com) as a commercial product. It was essentially the backend that would help users start sandboxed IPython kernels for mathematical and scientific computing.

### Current status

The code is extremely buggy, and probably doesn't work anymore. It will need significant rewrites to get anywhere. The project will probably be abandoned in favor of a new codebase, preferably in Javascript. Skyfall's just been put up here out in the open, and for all you know, some part of the codebase might help you somewhere. 

### Still want to wade in?

Contact me [here](http://rudimk.github.io/contact), and I'll help you get started.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
